thread.title: LSO St Luke's joins forces with caterer Moving Venue for a second year in a row
thread.title_full: LSO St Luke's joins forces with caterer Moving Venue for a second year in a row

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: LSO St Luke's joins forces with caterer Moving Venue for a second year in a row
text:
LSO St Luke's joins forces with caterer Moving Venue for a second year in a row LSO St Luke's joins forces with caterer Moving Venue for a second year in a row Details Category: 2015 Christmas Venues & Packages near you!   15:00 LSO St Luke's has announced that it will be working with Moving Venue by Smart to offer elegant Christmas parties at the venue for the second year in a row. The award-winning caterer focuses on using traditional ingredients with modern techniques and international influences in all its food. Moving Venue will create a flavoursome Christmas menu which will include a tempting selection of signature canapés and bowl food or a more formal seated three course dinner. 
Sales and Marketing Director of Moving Venue, Gail Heron, comments: “We had a successful first year in our joint venture with LSO St Luke’s and we are delighted to be planning our second year at this stunning venue. It gives us the opportunity to fine tune our offer and create another stylish experience for our clients and their guests this Christmas.” Alison Thompson LSO St Luke’s Centre Manager adds: “We are delighted to be joining forces with Moving Venue once again for our December season of Christmas party packages, building on the success of 2014. The beautiful setting of the Jerwood Hall combined with Moving Venue’s wonderful food offer all the right ingredients for exclusive and elegant Christmas celebrations. Related articles
